body_html:
@cpuhrsch I understand, just to clarify, I opened the issue following a short discussion with @soumith , quoting relevant bit by Soumith:

if you open an issue, I'll revert the PR and ask Christian to add a cmake check to see if VML is available, rather than assume MKL = VML-available
offending PR is #8458

Not sure if it's still relevant though.

body:
@cpuhrsch I understand, just to clarify, I opened the issue following a short discussion with @soumith , quoting relevant bit by Soumith:
> if you open an issue, I'll revert the PR and ask Christian to add a cmake check to see if VML is available, rather than assume MKL = VML-available
offending PR is https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/8458

Not sure if it's still relevant though.
